fulltext:
Duc Le Sy
Senior Software Engineer
Software Engineer with more than 8 years of experience in developing robust code for the high-volume project in Viettel Group with a
demonstrated history of working in the e-commerce and military industry. I am capable of developing, managing complex and large IT
systems such as: Internet banking, Mobile Banking, SMS Banking which satisfy rigorous standards in banking or a military application
which all have features: high availability, robustness, fault-tolerance, scalable, safety...
I am always interested in projects back-end which managed many connections and need to seft-define protocol to communicate or
following a banking or MIL standard protocol.
I started my career in 2010 as Java core/java enterprise developer, and since 2015, I have been working as C++ application developer.
Especially, I can work as team lead of core framework team to build library, framework for all team member use. I’m a hard-working,
responsible and enthusiastic person. I am able to organize tasks efficiently and to work under pressure.

Experience
2015-08
Senior Software Engineer/ Team leader
R&D the first and only UAV project for Vietnam army, including:
- Communicate with customers to continually establish clear operational
specifications and formulate system requirement
- Deliver software solutions consistent with the product roadmap and released
plan milestones
- Design software system architecture, network model and communication
protocol between GCS and UAV
- Implement some core modules by C/C++ and shell script using Qt
framework, STL and some our own libraries on Linux
- Seft-writing framework for all team member developing application.
- Increase efficiency by working directly with the Quality Assurance team to
develop automation tools and test cases that relieve manual testing loads
- Support junior developers joining in the middle of project, including: prepare
project documents and technical guide, train process and workflow, evaluate
solution and review source code

- Simulate a network of communication devices which helps for testing

2012-04
Software Engineer
R&D the first e-commerce project of Viettel, called BankPlus, including:
- Research and develop a mobile application for client.
- Research and develop a hybrid security protocol for client and server when
a transaction occurs.
- Develop a mobile gateway which receives requests from mobile clients and
forwards to core bank application and then responses to clients. 
- Develop a application which runs automatically run in schedule to reconcile
data client with bank and BCCS system of Viettel
